channel.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
channel.description:
hey guys, i want to talk about allstar/delta in general, since i own my own allstar and i am trying to make my allstar really fun. So lets talk about things that could make allstars so much better in many ways! (dont post if your gonna flame allstar sucks)
allstar doesnt suck! its actually a fun server and some of us like the older graphics and like trying to make our own unique servers (not some stupid leech from pi.. like alot of you out there)
these suggestions are not only for me, but for everybody who codes allstar! help us out some of us need shit to code! give us some ideas please guys :P
(best suggestion may win a prize in my game, if you want to play it, (prize probably mod or admin)) so start suggesting!!!
BTW ** MODS IF I POSTED IN WRONG SECTION PLEASE MOVE AS I DID NOT KNOW WHERE THE FART TO POST THIS :D

item.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

recker450:

To make Allstar better, I can think of some faults with a freshly downloaded version of Allstar.

[ul][li]Defence doesn’t work, a level 3 can land a hit on a level 126.[/li]
[li]No combat timers, a 2h can hit at the same rate of a scimitar.[/li]
[li]The magic system hasn’t been program correctly, you can cast a spell, but no graphics of the spell launching.[/li]
[li]Teleport is incomplete, no animation and graphics[/li]
[li]Mining gives cash instead of ores, and so does trees.[/li]
[li]Thieving gives players a unreasonable amount of cash.[/li]
[li]Skills are pointless.[/li]
[li]Most important skills in the server are: Attack, Strength, and Hp. IMO[/li]
[li]Range doesn’t allow players to shoot from a distance.[/li]
[li]Only bows count as range weapons, crossbows,darts,throwing knives, etc. doesn’t count.[/li]
[li]Better networking could be used to prevent random players from logging in and threatening the owners to give them admin or else they’ll crash the server with AFG bot downloaded from the internet.[/li]
[li]Barrows mini-game is partially complete and the sets has not much purpose except Dharoks.[/li]
[li]Fletching doesn’t work 100%[/li]
[li]Quests precoded by Mod Allstar cannot be completed legitly and items must be spawned and most are incomplete.[/li]
[li]Players can reach 99 stats in less than a day or 2.[/li]
[li]The economy is worse than the US economy[/li][/ul]

On my way to a better Allstar

Thanks for the list.

Read full topic

item.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

To make Allstar better, I can think of some faults with a freshly downloaded version of Allstar.

[ul][li]Defence doesn’t work, a level 3 can land a hit on a level 126.[/li]
[li]No combat timers, a 2h can hit at the same rate of a scimitar.[/li]
[li]The magic system hasn’t been program correctly, you can cast a spell, but no graphics of the spell launching.[/li]
[li]Teleport is incomplete, no animation and graphics[/li]
[li]Mining gives cash instead of ores, and so does trees.[/li]
[li]Thieving gives players a unreasonable amount of cash.[/li]
[li]Skills are pointless.[/li]
[li]Most important skills in the server are: Attack, Strength, and Hp. IMO[/li]
[li]Range doesn’t allow players to shoot from a distance.[/li]
[li]Only bows count as range weapons, crossbows,darts,throwing knives, etc. doesn’t count.[/li]
[li]Better networking could be used to prevent random players from logging in and threatening the owners to give them admin or else they’ll crash the server with AFG bot downloaded from the internet.[/li]
[li]Barrows mini-game is partially complete and the sets has not much purpose except Dharoks.[/li]
[li]Fletching doesn’t work 100%[/li]
[li]Quests precoded by Mod Allstar cannot be completed legitly and items must be spawned and most are incomplete.[/li]
[li]Players can reach 99 stats in less than a day or 2.[/li]
[li]The economy is worse than the US economy[/li][/ul]

The game play of Allstar is very repetitive. Player logs in>Does ::starter>goes train>get 99 stats>get godswords>get Allstar Hammer(meat tenderizer) >buy every rare>get bored>the server now becomes a place for him to hangout and theres nothing else for him to do.

tl;dr
Allstars are classic, but lots of work and dedication are needed to make it fun.

EDIT:
The system of picking up items is flawed. There is this 1 common glitch where there would be a stack of items in 1 spot, a player would spam click onto the item stack on the floor, only to pick up about 5 items and the rest would be gone.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

ReaperXScape:

gtfo kid, lets see you make an allstar better then mine

Please, stop further humiliating yourself. If you would care to look, clawz_fury has released a multitude of tutorials, snippets, and a blank framework or two.
Also, I’d like to see a log of all of your supposedly patched bugs, seeing as Allstar bases have more glitches than meets the eye. Mind giving me an estimate of how many players your server can hold at one time before crashing, and with proof?
Oh, and you didn’t ‘make’ your Allstar base, unless you created a framework yourself and named it after the Allstar base.

item.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

ReaperXScape:

yeah most bugs are fixed

Please excuse my skepticism if you actually have but what I recommended you to do is not an easy job. You may have fixed the bugs that you know about but I’m sure their are many you don’t know about which will be abused if you do get a good player count. Many people have attempted to improve allstar and because of the design (I believe, I’ve never actually messed around with allstar) and in my own personal opinion many if not all publicly released works have failed at the coders attempts (they have been improved but not to a good enough standard to compete with other more popular bases).
If you have done as you say you have it would be nice of you to share your work with the community, I’m sure many people would appreciate it.

Read full topic

item.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@Flame_
I’m not saying your reasoning behind your decision was a bad decision, I understand where you are coming from completely. I haven’t commented my opinion regarding the debate/argument because I have no interest in the debate/argument itself.

The thing that did interest me was the statement you made, as superficially it makes sense but when you actually think about it the statement wasn’t the right thing to say. I knew people would agree with the statement you made without thinking about it and sure enough Arham did (I had typed up my post before I saw his post). I have no issue with the reason you chose to say it, I just didn’t like the statement itself.

[quote=“ReaperXScape, post:25, topic:516405”]well im trying to make the server good, more suggestions please?

*looking for a second developer who has experience in allstars[/quote]
Theirs lots of suggestions here worth doing. If you want people to offer even more advice/help then you should state what you’ve done out of the suggestions or why you think their bad suggestions otherwise people will think theirs no point in posting suggestions if they can’t build up a good idea of what you want.
Personally back in the days when I used to play Allstar based servers the content that was nothing like how Runescape was, was what made the servers fun. The only reasoning to why I think Allstar servers aren’t popular is because of the bugs and stability. Also, two big deterrents to why I don’t play Allstar are lack of players and the facts they go down like a few days after they get released to the public to play.
Find a solution to the above problems and I’m sure it will be a very popular RSPS assuming you get the advertising correct. Content isn’t a big of an issue as advertising in my opinion. I always found getting players harder than getting good content implemented, you can have good content but no players and it can work the other way round.

Read full topic

item.title: [Allstar] how to make allstar better?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:22, topic:516405”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=634665.msg4285139#msg4285139 date=1366236050]

dude its hard… what i said was easy because he wanted to make our “own version” of the party room and it sucked balls

Don’t critique what you can’t significantly make better yourself.
[/quote]
I’m not involved in this debate/argument etc but I believe that statement is completely wrong. For the main reason that you don’t need to have skill in the relevant area.
I.E. You could buy a pizza from a takeaway but according to your advice (taken out of context ofc but it shouldn’t be said in all if not many situations anyways) you can not criticize it if it’s bad since in the situation you can’t make pizza.

I’m not on the OP’s side or anything, I’m just saying you shouldn’t make statements like that.[/quote]
You are correct in saying that, but my reason for saying what I said was because the OP had stated that he could have made the same thing just as easily, yet he shows no evidence of attempting to even make it better, or even gratifying the other member who had taken the time to help him.

To keep myself from penalization and to keep this thread on topic, I’d like to point out a few things that would improve an allstar-based source.

[ul][li]Refrain from using the same home as most allstars already use. I suggest basing the home perhaps in the elven villages.[/li]
[li]Attempt to stabilize the game. A member by the name of TheLetterQArousesMe released a cleaned client a while back. I haven’t taken a personal look into the code, but it seems decent.[/li]
[li]If you are going to have floating text ingame (I am referring to the “[i]Players Online:, Time until next restart”), please only have the Players Online: feature.[/li]
[li]Have your shops feature either only the bare necessities to jump start the economy, or have a shop dedicated to everything; a general store of necessities in a sense.[/li]
[li]Don’t center your server around bossing. For those who like to skill and/or chat, it becomes very boring after a while when there is no one to chat with.[/li]
[li]Make the value of each individual gold piece worth a little more. One of the biggest turnoffs for me is seeing a server where obtaining and attaining max cash in just a few days quickly ruins a server.[/li][/ul]

And yadayada.
To the above comment, be clearer then. You only said that he did something for you and that you think it was bad, yet you never attempted to replicate/make it better yourself.

Read full topic
